content.text:
Let me help you solve this block assembly task by breaking it down step by step:

1. Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- Total blocks: 8 blocks
- Layers: 3 layers
- Colors used: Red, Blue, Green, Orange, Yellow
- Structure has two main sections:
  a) A taller, more complex structure on the left
  b) A simpler, lower structure on the right

2. Block Selection from Dictionary:
Required blocks (by index):
- Block 1 (Red arch)
- Block 2 (Blue cube)
- Block 3 (Green cube)
- Block 4 (Orange cube)
- Block 8 (Orange cylinder)
- Block 9 (Orange cylinder)
- Block 10 (Orange cylinder)
- Block 6 (Yellow rectangular block)
- Block 12 (Orange triangular block)

3. Assembly Instructions:
{
   Step1: Move block 1 (Red arch)
   Step2: Move block 4 (Orange cube) on top of arch
   Step3: Move block 2 (Blue cube) on top of orange cube
   Step4: Move block 3 (Green cube) next to blue cube
   Step5: Move block 12 (Orange triangular block) on top
   Step6: Move block 8 (Orange cylinder) on side
   Step7: Move block 9 (Orange cylinder) on side
   Step8: Move block 10 (Orange cylinder) on side
   Step9: Move block 6 (Yellow rectangular block) on top of cylinders
}
